The video was analyzed using digital ver: 2. A Google reverse image search of one of the frames revealed that the video is at least four months old.
The video was found to be shot at Lojas: a Brazilian retail chain, through a reverse search on the extracted frames.
An article published by a website called: Costa Norte" claimed that the incident in the video took place at a shopping center in Recife, Pernambuco state of Brazil.
